Web Accessibility Daily

A11y Basics

What is Web Accessibility

The overall goal of web accessibility is to provide information and services to as many people as possible.
Scandal

100% of newspaper websites not accessible

All of the five analysed newspaper websites are not completely accessible to users with disabilities.
Step-By-Step

How to code accessible websites in 2020

There are some steps you can follow to make your websites more accessible. The WCAG standards are a good resource ...

Top News

View a website in grayscale mode

When testing a website in grayscale mode, elements that work with colour only will be revealed to the manual tester.

WCAG Recommendations

Contrast ratio and colour blindness

According to the WCAG 2.1, for the accessibility level AA, a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 is needed for text and images of a text.

Cookie Information

This website does not collect any cookies as its purpose is to demonstrate accessible component implementation.

This prototype demonstrates an implementation of common components on a newspaper website, but with accessibility in mind.
